description: Dual paths of life-giving restoration (Flow) and crushing pressure (Depths).

abilities.name: Flowing Restoration
abilities.effect: Restore 1d8 Vitality to a target and move them up to 5 feet.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, an ally's movement does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity for this turn.

abilities.name: Mending Flow
abilities.effect: Enhances Flowing Restoration. The target is also cleansed of one minor negative physical effect (e.g., 'Blinded').

abilities.name: Water Whip
abilities.effect: You can create a whip of water that deals 1d6 physical damage and has the Finesse and Reach properties.

abilities.name: Purity of the Tide
abilities.effect: You can touch an ally to end one 'Poisoned' status effect on them. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Healing Bubble
abilities.effect: You can enclose an adjacent ally in a protective bubble for one round. The next time they are hit by a ranged attack, they take half damage.

abilities.name: Healing Flood
abilities.effect: Restore 1d10 Vitality to a single target and remove any lingering fire or poison effects.

abilities.name: Ride the Current
abilities.effect: Move yourself and up to two allies up to 30 feet in a straight line without provoking Attacks of Opportunity.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flood
abilities.effect: Enhances Healing Flood. It now also affects all allies within 10 feet of the primary target, healing them for half the amount.

abilities.name: Tidal Shield
abilities.effect: Create a swirling shield of water around an ally. For 3 rounds, melee attackers are pushed back 10 feet. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Regenerating Stream
abilities.effect: You can create a stream of water around a single ally. At the start of their turn for the next 3 rounds, they regain 1d6 Vitality. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Mass Mending
abilities.effect: All allies in a 15-foot radius are healed for 3d8 Vitality. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Tidal Shield (Expert)
abilities.effect: Enhances Tidal Shield. The melee attacker is now pushed back 15 feet.

abilities.name: Purifying Rains
abilities.effect: You call a small rainstorm in a 20-foot radius. All allies in the area are healed for 2d8 Vitality and are cured of all status effects. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Sanctuary of the Deep
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, you create a 20-foot aura around you. Allies within the aura gain a +2 bonus to all defensive rolls. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Font of Life
abilities.effect: Create a 20-foot radius spring. Allies who end their turn in the spring's pool regain 2d8 Vitality.

abilities.name: Blessing of the Sea
abilities.effect: For 1 minute, you and all allies are immune to being 'Restrained', 'Grappled', or 'Paralyzed', and can use a bonus action to move 10 feet. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Tidal Rebirth
abilities.effect: Once per day, you can restore a single 'Downed' ally to full vitality. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Blessing of the Sea
abilities.effect: You and all allies are immune to being 'Restrained', 'Grappled', or 'Paralyzed', and can use a bonus action to move 10 feet. Usable once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: World Tide
abilities.effect: You bring forth a massive wave of life energy that restores all allies to full vitality, removes all negative status effects, and grants them a +2 bonus to all rolls for 3 rounds. Usable once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Crushing Wave
abilities.effect: Target must make a Might DC 12 check or be knocked back 10 feet and take 1d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Water Jet
abilities.effect: Fire a jet of water, dealing 1d8 physical damage. This ability has a lower DC.

abilities.name: Ink Cloud
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot cube of magical ink, heavily obscuring the area for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: Pressure Spike
abilities.effect: You launch a lance of high-pressure water at a single target. The attack deals 1d10 physical damage and ignores the target's armor.

abilities.name: Tidal Pull
abilities.effect: You can use a bonus action to pull a single enemy 5 feet toward you. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Water Sphere
abilities.effect: You create a bubble of water around a target's head. The target must make a Might DC 12 check or be unable to speak or cast spells with a verbal component for 1 round.

abilities.name: Crushing Undertow
abilities.effect: Enemies in a 15-foot cone must make a Might DC 13 check or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Whirlpool
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot radius whirlpool. The area is difficult terrain and creatures starting their turn inside are pulled 10 feet toward the center (Might DC 13).

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.effect: You can create a localized whirlpool at a single point, trapping an enemy for 1 round unless they succeed on an Agility DC 13 check. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Crushing Grip
abilities.effect: You create a fist of water that crushes a single target, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage and forcing them to make a Might DC 13 check or be 'Restrained' for 1 round. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Geyser
abilities.effect: You cause a geyser of water to erupt from the ground beneath a single enemy. The target takes 2d6 physical damage and is pushed 15 feet into the air. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Pressure Spike
abilities.effect: Hit a single target with a lance of high-pressure water, dealing 4d10 physical damage and pushing them back 20 feet (Might DC 15).

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: You release a wave of water in a 30-foot cone. All enemies in the area are knocked back 15 feet and take 3d8 bludgeoning damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Call the Kraken
abilities.effect: Summon two massive tentacles for 3 rounds. As a bonus action, command each to attack, dealing 3d8 bludgeoning damage and attempting to 'Grapple' (Might DC 16).

abilities.name: Abyss's Grasp
abilities.effect: You can create a dark vortex of water that pulls all enemies within 20 feet to its center. They are then hit with a burst of cold damage equal to 3d10. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Tsunami
abilities.effect: Summon a massive wave in a 60-foot cone. Creatures take 6d12 bludgeoning damage and are pushed 60 feet on a failed Might DC 18 check (half damage and no push on success). This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Kraken's Command
abilities.effect: You gain control of the two tentacles summoned by Call the Kraken for the duration of the combat. You can now command them with a bonus action.

abilities.name: Crushing Pressure
abilities.effect: You can choose a single target. They must make a Might DC 18 check or be 'Stunned' for 1 round. If they fail by 5 or more, they are also 'Restrained' for 1 round. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Tsunami
abilities.effect: Summon a massive wave in a 60-foot cone. Creatures take 6d12 bludgeoning damage and are pushed 60 feet on a failed Might DC 18 check (half damage and no push on success). Usable once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: The Abyss's Call
abilities.effect: You summon a massive, ghostly kraken to the battlefield. The Kraken remains on the field for 3 rounds, and you can command it to attack or grapple an enemy with a bonus action. The Kraken deals 10d10 physical damage and can grapple a large creature. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
